title: SPAC Week: Clever Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: SPAC week continues with Kyle Detwiler, CEO of Clever Leaves, a recent entrant to Nasdaq. Building one of the largest cannabis companies in the world using a much more capital efficient funding process. going the SPAC route. Cannabis grown in Colombia, being GMP-certified, LatAm region makes sense especially for extraction use. Cannabis on a global stage. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
